analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/39/0x06534a4580750813c60a5b410e79480b516bbf14.sol:
	Contract WSTO has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/39/0x06534a4580750813c60a5b410e79480b516bbf14.sol#216)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/39/0x06534a4580750813c60a5b410e79480b516bbf14.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/39/0x06534a4580750813c60a5b410e79480b516bbf14.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/39/0x06534a4580750813c60a5b410e79480b516bbf14.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
